verses.verse: And in the seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320>, on the first<WH259> day of the month<WH2320>, you shall have an holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744>; you shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work<WH4399>: it is a day<WH3117> of blowing the trumpets unto you<WH8643>.

And you shall offer<WH6213> a burnt offering<WH5930> for a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> unto the Lord<WH3068>; one<WH259> young<WH1241> bullock<WH6499>, one<WH259> ram<WH352>, and seven<WH7651> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without blemish<WH8549>:

And their food offering<WH4503> shall be of flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>, three<WH7969> tenth deals<WH6241> for a bullock<WH6499>, and two<WH8147> tenth deals<WH6241> for a ram<WH352>,
And one<WH259> tenth deal<WH6241> for one<WH259> lamb<WH3532>, throughout the seven<WH7651> lambs<WH3532>:
And one<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin offering<WH2403>, to make an atonement for you<WH3722>:

Beside the burnt offering<WH5930> of the month<WH2320>, and his food offering<WH4503>, and the daily<WH8548> burnt offering<WH5930>, and his food offering<WH4503>, and their drink offerings<WH5262>, according unto their manner<WH4941>, for a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381>, a sacrifice made by fire<WH801> unto the Lord<WH3068>.

And you shall have on the tenth<WH6218> day of this seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320> an holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744>; and you shall afflict<WH6031> your souls<WH5315>: you shall not do<WH6213> any work in it<WH4399>:

But you shall offer<WH7126> a burnt offering<WH5930> unto the Lord<WH3068> for a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381>; one<WH259> young<WH1241> bullock<WH6499>, one<WH259> ram<WH352>, and seven<WH7651> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141>; they shall be unto you without blemish<WH8549>:

And their food offering<WH4503> shall be of flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>, three<WH7969> tenth deals<WH6241> to a bullock<WH6499>, and two<WH8147> tenth deals<WH6241> to one<WH259> ram<WH352>,
A tenth deal<WH6241> for one<WH259> lamb<WH3532>, throughout the seven<WH7651> lambs<WH3532>:

One<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin offering<WH2403>; beside the sin offering<WH2403> of atonement<WH3725>, and the continual<WH8548> burnt offering<WH5930>, and the food offering<WH4503> of it<WH5262>, and their drink offerings.

And on the fifteenth<WH2568> day<WH3117> of the seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320> you shall have an holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744>; you shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work<WH4399>, and you shall keep<WH2287> a feast<WH2282> unto the Lord<WH3068> seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>:

And you shall offer<WH7126> a burnt offering<WH5930>, a sacrifice made by fire<WH801>, of a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> unto the Lord<WH3068>; thirteen<WH7969> young<WH1241> bullocks<WH6499>, two<WH8147> rams<WH352>, and fourteen<WH702> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141>; they shall be without blemish<WH8549>:

And their food offering<WH4503> shall be of flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>, three<WH7969> tenth deals<WH6241> unto every<WH259> bullock<WH6499> of the thirteen<WH7969> bullocks<WH6499>, two<WH8147> tenth deals<WH6241> to each<WH259> ram<WH352> of the two<WH8147> rams<WH352>,
And a tenth deal<WH6241> to each<WH259> lamb<WH3532> of the fourteen<WH702> lambs<WH3532>:
And one<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin offering<WH2403>; beside the continual<WH8548> burnt offering<WH5930>, his food offering<WH4503>, and his drink offering<WH5262>.

And on the second<WH8145> day<WH3117> you shall offer twelve<WH8147> young<WH1121> bullocks<WH6499>, two<WH8147> rams<WH352>, fourteen<WH702> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without spot<WH8549>:

And their food offering<WH4503> and their drink offerings<WH5262> for the bullocks<WH6499>, for the rams<WH352>, and for the lambs<WH3532>, shall be according to their number<WH4557>, after the manner<WH4941>:

And one<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin offering<WH2403>; beside the continual<WH8548> burnt offering<WH5930>, and the food offering<WH4503> there<WH5262>, and their drink offerings.
And on the third<WH7992> day<WH3117> eleven<WH6249> bullocks<WH6499>, two<WH8147> rams<WH352>, fourteen<WH702> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without blemish<WH8549>;

And their food offering<WH4503> and their drink offerings<WH5262> for the bullocks<WH6499>, for the rams<WH352>, and for the lambs<WH3532>, shall be according to their number<WH4557>, after the manner<WH4941>:
And one<WH259> goat<WH8163> for a sin offering<WH2403>; beside the continual<WH8548> burnt offering<WH5930>, and his food offering<WH4503>, and his drink offering<WH5262>.
And on the fourth<WH7243> day<WH3117> ten<WH6235> bullocks<WH6499>, two<WH8147> rams<WH352>, and fourteen<WH702> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without blemish<WH8549>:

Their food offering<WH4503> and their drink offerings<WH5262> for the bullocks<WH6499>, for the rams<WH352>, and for the lambs<WH3532>, shall be according to their number<WH4557>, after the manner<WH4941>:
And one<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin offering<WH2403>; beside the continual<WH8548> burnt offering<WH5930>, his food offering<WH4503>, and his drink offering<WH5262>.
And on the fifth<WH2549> day<WH3117> nine<WH8672> bullocks<WH6499>, two<WH8147> rams<WH352>, and fourteen<WH702> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without spot<WH8549>:

And their food offering<WH4503> and their drink offerings<WH5262> for the bullocks<WH6499>, for the rams<WH352>, and for the lambs<WH3532>, shall be according to their number<WH4557>, after the manner<WH4941>:
And one<WH259> goat<WH8163> for a sin offering<WH2403>; beside the continual<WH8548> burnt offering<WH5930>, and his food offering<WH4503>, and his drink offering<WH5262>.
And on the sixth<WH8345> day<WH3117> eight<WH8083> bullocks<WH6499>, two<WH8147> rams<WH352>, and fourteen<WH702> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without blemish<WH8549>:

And their food offering<WH4503> and their drink offerings<WH5262> for the bullocks<WH6499>, for the rams<WH352>, and for the lambs<WH3532>, shall be according to their number<WH4557>, after the manner<WH4941>:
And one<WH259> goat<WH8163> for a sin offering<WH2403>; beside the continual<WH8548> burnt offering<WH5930>, his food offering<WH4503>, and his drink offering<WH5262>.
And on the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> seven<WH7651> bullocks<WH6499>, two<WH8147> rams<WH352>, and fourteen<WH702> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without blemish<WH8549>:

And their food offering<WH4503> and their drink offerings<WH5262> for the bullocks<WH6499>, for the rams<WH352>, and for the lambs<WH3532>, shall be according to their number<WH4557>, after the manner<WH4941>:
And one<WH259> goat<WH8163> for a sin offering<WH2403>; beside the continual<WH8548> burnt offering<WH5930>, his food offering<WH4503>, and his drink offering<WH5262>.
On the eighth<WH8066> day<WH3117> you shall have a solemn assembly<WH6116>: you shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work in it<WH4399>:

But you shall offer<WH7126> a burnt offering<WH5930>, a sacrifice made by fire<WH801>, of a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> unto the Lord<WH3068>: one<WH259> bullock<WH6499>, one<WH259> ram<WH352>, seven<WH7651> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without blemish<WH8549>:

Their food offering<WH4503> and their drink offerings<WH5262> for the bullock<WH6499>, for the ram<WH352>, and for the lambs<WH3532>, shall be according to their number<WH4557>, after the manner<WH4941>:
And one<WH259> goat<WH8163> for a sin offering<WH2403>; beside the continual<WH8548> burnt offering<WH5930>, and his food offering<WH4503>, and his drink offering<WH5262>.

These things you shall do<WH6213> unto the Lord<WH3068> in your set feasts<WH4150>, beside your vows<WH5088>, and your freewill offerings<WH5071>, for your burnt offerings<WH5930>, and for your food offerings<WH4503>, and for your drink offerings<WH5262>, and for your peace offerings<WH8002>.
And Moses<WH4872> told<WH559> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> according to all that the Lord<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.
